official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to convey certain real property in the vicinity of the Lewisville Dam in Denton County, Texas, to the persons from whom the United States acquired the property.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to permit the purchase of certain real property in Denton County, Texas, by the persons from whom the United States acquired the property.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to convey certain real property in the vicinity of the Lewisville Dam in Denton County, Texas, to the persons from whom the United States acquired the property.
